import React from 'react' import './videofooter.css' import {MusicNote} from '@material-ui/icons' import Ticker from 'react-ticker' function VideoFooter({username, description, song}) { return (
@{username}

{description}

{({index}) => ( <>

{song}

)}
) } export default VideoFooter
